md:
giải nghĩa từ "coasters" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ tương tự.

* Coasters (noun) - những miếng lót ly
	+ Meaning: small mats or pieces of material used to protect surfaces from water marks or spills, especially under glasses or cups.
	+ Example: "She placed a coaster under her coffee cup to protect the table."
	+ Related words: mat, pad, placemat
	+ Similar words: table runner, tablecloth, placemat

* Coasters (noun) - tàu lượn
	+ Meaning: a type of amusement park ride that has a series of hills and curves, often with steep drops and sharp turns.
	+ Example: "The roller coaster at the amusement park was really scary."
	+ Related words: roller, amusement park, ride
	+ Similar words: Ferris wheel, merry-go-round, funfair

Note: The two meanings of "coasters" are unrelated and have different pronunciations. The first meaning is pronounced as /ˈkoʊstərz/ (KOH-sturz), while the second meaning is pronounced as /ˈroʊlər ˈkoʊstərz/ (ROH-lur KOH-sturz).

  • Coasters (noun) - những miếng lót ly

    • Example: "She placed a coaster under her coffee cup to protect the table."
    • Related words: mat, pad, placemat

  • Coasters (noun) - tàu lượn

    • Meaning: a type of amusement park ride that has a series of hills and curves, often with steep drops and sharp turns.
    • Example: "The roller coaster at the amusement park was really scary."
    • Related words: roller, amusement park, ride
    • Similar words: Ferris wheel, merry-go-round, funfair

Note: The two meanings of "coasters" are unrelated and have different pronunciations. The first meaning is pronounced as /ˈkoʊstərz/ (KOH-sturz), while the second meaning is pronounced as /ˈroʊlər ˈkoʊstərz/ (ROH-lur KOH-sturz).
